Title: Relates to requiring drug tests for potential employees of the office of mental health and the office for people with developmental disabilities
Summary: Requires drug tests for potential employees of the office of mental health and the office for people with developmental disabilities.
LawCode: Amd §§7.23 & 13.23, Ment Hyg L; add §153, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law and the civil service law, in relation to requiring drug testing for all potential officers, employees and volunteers of the office of mental health and the office for people with developmental disabilities prior to employment
